Articles.Content: Hi, Is there anyway to load a .craft file that has dlc parts if you haven't got the dlc? Thanks.
You can't load a .craft file with parts you don't have.

Hi @_technological_. Your question has been moved to the Gameplay subforum, but unfortunately the answer is no. You can copy the file into your game but the craft will not load in the assembly buildings. The good news, though, is that there are periodic sales on Steam and the other distribution sites if you'd like to acquire the DLCs. 

And welcome to the forum.
